Text: World Kindness Day is an international observance on 13 November.
Triplets:<World Kindness Day
1:
--------------------
Text: World Kindness Day:  It was introduced in 1998 by the World Kindness Movement a coalition of nations kindness NGOs.
Triplets:<World Kindness Day
2:
--------------------
Text: World Kindness Day:  It is observed in many countries, including Canada, Japan, Australia, Nigeria and United Arab Emirates.
Triplets:<World Kindness Day
4:
--------------------
Text: World Kindness Day:  Italy and India also observed the day.

Triplets:<World Kindness Day
5:
--------------------
Text: World Kindness Day:  In the UK it is fronted by David Jamilly co-founded Kindness Day UK.
Triplets:<World Kindness Day

Text: World Kindness Day:  Events include THE BIG HUG, handing out Kindness Cards, Global Flashmob, which was coordinated by Orly Wahba from USA which was held in 15 countries and 33 cities with its images of the event making the big screens in New York City.

Text: World Kindness Day:  Kindness Cards are also an ongoing activity which can either be passed on to recognize an act of kindness and or ask that an act of kindness be done.

ask that an act of kindness be done
16:
--------------------
Text: World Kindness Day: Approaches are being made to the United Nations by the peak global body, The World Kindness Movement to have World Kindness Day officially recognized and its members unanimously sign a Declaration of Support for World Kindness.
